ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend it to anyone interested in nationalism or theinteraction between politics and religion.

I would highly recommend the course for anyone interested in the topic and seeking a broad insight in the various forms and cases of religious nationalism. The course has introduced several different ways of analyzing cases of religious nationalism thus engaging not only in the theoretical and historical cases themselves but also in methodological aspects of the analysis of religious nationalism. A very inspiring course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course made me more aware of what interests I would like to pursue and how. I appreciate the broad introduction to the field and the historical comparative approach.
